Description:-

 Beamer is the easiest way to stream video from your Mac to Apple TV. It works just like a regular desktop media player, but the video plays on Apple TV. Just open any movie file and press play.

Forget what you know about the limitations of AirPlay on the Mac. Beamer takes care of the details, so you can sit down and enjoy all your videos on Apple TV.
